import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import ConfirmationModal from '../components/ConfirmationModal'; import productImg from '../assets/products.png'; import itemImage from '../assets/fabric.png'; import mastercardIcon from '../assets/Mastercard.png'; import visaIcon from '../assets/Visa.png'; import bkashIcon from '../assets/Bkash.png'; import nagadIcon from '../assets/Nagad.png'; const CheckoutPage = () => { const [saveInfo, setSaveInfo] = useState(true); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('bank'); const [showConfirmation, setShowConfirmation] = useState(false); // Sample cart items const cartItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Shabby Fabric I', price: 650, image: productImg }, { id: 2, name: 'Shabby Fabric I', price: 650, image: productImg } ]; const subtotal = 1750; const salesTax = 20; const shipping = 'Free'; const couponDiscount = 10; const total = 1760; return ( <>

{/* Billing Form - Left Side */}
setSaveInfo(!saveInfo)} />
{/* Order Summary - Right Side */}

Cart Total

{/* Cart Items */} {cartItems.map(item => (
{item.name} ${item.price}
))}
Subtotal (1 item) ${subtotal}
Sales Tax: ${salesTax}
Shipping: {shipping}
Coupon Discount: -${couponDiscount}
Total: ${total}
{/* Payment Methods */}
setPaymentMethod('bank')} /> {paymentMethod === 'bank' && (
)}
setPaymentMethod('cash')} />
); }; export default CheckoutPage;
